trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Southend-on-Sea
There were no other sightings in Southend-on-Sea on or around April 28th 2013
Summary: Looked up at moon see a big but high orange pulsating orb fly strait into seem behind moon then go across then go away from me very fast but high
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window up at moon in leigh on sea essex england as I do a lot.it was a very clear night .i notist just up above me to the left a big but high glowing orange and yellow orb so I got my phone and started to film as I did I watched with my eyes on off camera as it seemed to go strait into the moon pulsing.then it come from what look like behind moon traveling to my right getting brighter then it seemed to start going way from me over sea to Kent and then lost sight over roofs I know what it was and felt very surprised to see such a thing I have sent video please contact me to let me know what it is if not a ufo.it lasted for about 2mins or more
